name: Office Life Simulator
description:
You have downloaded the game Office Life Simulator off of a dodgy bootleg games website. While the game seems sound, there may be a Virus hidden inside. Your resignation form has been stolen and you must get it back. Explore your office building to try and find items to bribe you coworkers with.

**GAME DOES NOT ACTUALLY CONTAIN A VIRUS**

Created with GlitterDemon (Art) and WorldWideWaffles (Music)

Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
